func.title: GetPlayerColor
func.desc: Determines the player color. The player color is used to identify various owned objects such as flags or clonks as well as his text messages.

example.code: Log("<c %x>%s</c> has a score of %d.", GetPlayerColor(0), GetPlayerName(0), GetScore(0));
example.text: Returns status information about the first player, highlighting the player's name in the player color.
